segments.text: You seem to be very hesitant about doing things .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't know why I cannot take a step forward .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You are meeting trouble halfway , I guess .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Many things are troubling me . I don't know whether I should come and go .
segments.speaker: S2
